description: Make this baked eggs recipe for a tasty breakfast for two. With baked beans, chorizo and tomato, it’s a filling, flavoursome way to start the day.
keywords: Egg dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Baked Egg Pot with Baked Beans & Chorizo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g SPC baked beans in rich tomato

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a frying pan with a splash of oil. Lightly fry baked beans and chorizo sausage. Add tomatoes and bring to simmer for 3-4 mins.
Spoon bean and tomato mixture into 2 oven-safe ramekins and make a well in the middle of each. Break an egg into each ramekin and season with salt, pepper and chilli flakes (optional)
Place ramekins into the oven and bake for 10-15mins until eggs are cooked.
